title: The Obituary Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
The Obituary Cocktail Recipe
Close

Prep
5 mins

Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
gin
1/4
ounce
dry vermouth
1/4
ounce
absinthe
or pastis
Directions
Combine ingredients with ice and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Special equipment
glass, cocktail strainer
